articles.title: Biden Signs Hate Crimes Bill Amid Attacks On Asian Americans - NPR
articles.description: The legislation, which had overwhelming support in the House and Senate, aims to make reporting hate crimes easier and puts resources into monitoring and preventing those crimes.
articles.content:
President Biden signs into law the COVID-19 Hate Crimes Act on Thursday in the East Room of the White House.

articles.title: PM: Asia should lead in lifting drug patents - New Straits Times
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR: Asia should lead the way in opening up patent protections to produce cheaper generic versions of life-saving medicines for critical diseases, from Covid-19 to HIV/AIDS, said Prime Minister Tan Sri Muhyiddin Yassin.

articles.title: Scientists in Asia resumed work far quicker than western counterparts, international COVID lockdown - EurekAlert
articles.description: Researchers in China, Japan, and Singapore were able to resume research much quicker than their counterparts in the US and Europe after the first covid lockdowns, results of a new international survey suggest.
